original_text: And when the Lord has done to my lord according to all the good that he has spoken concerning you and has appointed you prince over Israel,
korean_text: 여호와께서 내 주에 대하여 하신 말씀대로 모든 선을 내 주에게 행하사 내 주를 이스라엘의 지도자로 세우실 때에

sentences.original_text: And when the Lord has done to my lord
that he has spoken concerning you
and has appointed you prince over Israel
